DETAILS

Anastasia Beverly Hills **Magic Touch Concealer** corrects, brightens, blurs and conceals while blending to a luminous second-skin finish. The lightweight formula melts into skin with the consistency of creamy water and delivers buildable medium to full coverage, while light-reflecting ingredients neutralize imperfections and create a soft-focus effect with a natural finish. Magic Touch Concealer helps to hydrate the delicate under eye area and provides smooth, creaseless, and comfortable wear without oxidizing or settling into fine lines. Amino acid-coated pigments ensure immediate adhesion and easy, flexible blendability. The teardrop-shaped wand deposits a generous amount and fits perfectly into small areas of the face for precise application. Find your magic match from 25 versatile shades.

Size: 0.4 Fl. Oz. | 12 mL

WHY YOU'LL LOVE IT

*   Ultra-smooth, crease-less formula melts into skin for a luminous, natural finish.
*   Lightweight, second-skin formula provides buildable, medium to full coverage that is undetectable.
*   Instantly brightens under eyes, conceals blemishes and masks discoloration for an even complexion.
*   Helps to blur pores, fine lines and wrinkles with no caking or settling.
*   Creamy, rich texture provides seamless application and blending with comfortable wearability.
*   Plant-based glycerin helps to moisturize.
*   Licorice root helps to soothe and calm.
*   Amino acid coated pigments help with immediate adhesion.
*   Extended play time for perfect placement and flexible blendability before setting.
*   Soft focus powders reflect the light to help blur imperfections for perfected skin.
*   Easy-to-apply tear drop shaped applicator delivers the perfect amount of product and precise application.
*   Multi-use formula can be used to spot conceal, highlight, color correct and for all-over coverage.
*   Pairs perfectly with any type of foundation finish and coverage.
*   Ideal for all skin types.
*   Available in 25 versatile shades that do not shift or oxidize.
*   Luxe, portable packaging for easy use at home or on-the-go.
*   Paraben-free, Gluten-free, Alcohol-free, Fragrance-free, Dermatologist tested, Ophthalmologist tested
*   Vegan and cruelty-free.

HOW TO APPLY

**SPOT-CONCEALING**

*   Using the wand, apply directly under the eyes, over blemishes or discoloration – anywhere you want extra coverage. Start with a light layer and build as desired. Blend and diffuse using Brush 18 or tap with your fingertips using gentle pressure.
*   For under eyes, select a shade that is one-two shades lighter than your skin tone. Apply two-three dots and blend edges. For dark circles, select a shade with a peach undertone to color correct and brighten.
*   For blemishes, select a shade that is closest to your skin tone. Apply one dot and blend edges.
*   For redness, select a shade with a golden undertone to neutralize. Apply directly to discolored areas and blend edges.

**HIGHLIGHT + CONTOUR**

*   To use as[**highlighter**](https://www.anastasiabeverlyhills.com/collections/highlight-glow), select a shade that is two shades lighter than your skin tone. Apply to the high points of the face: upper cheekbone, center of forehead, bridge and tip of the nose, and cupid’s bow.
*   To use as[**contour**](https://www.anastasiabeverlyhills.com/collections/contour), select a shade that is two to three shades deeper than your skin tone. Apply to the hollows of the cheekbone, hairline, temples and jawline.

**ALL-OVER COVERAGE**

*   Select a shade that is closest to your skin tone. Using the wand, apply dots to the forehead, cheeks, nose and chin. Blend and diffuse using A30 Pro Brush. Use stippling motions to build coverage.

**PRO TIPS:**

*   Apply directly from the wand with fingertips,[**Brush 18**](https://www.anastasiabeverlyhills.com/products/brush-18)or[**A30 Pro Brush**](https://www.anastasiabeverlyhills.com/products/pro-brush-a30-domed-kabuki-brush-1).
*   Start with a light layer and build as desired, a little bit goes a long way.
*   Can be worn by itself or on top of[**foundation**](https://www.anastasiabeverlyhills.com/products/luminous-foundation).
*   Pair with[**Loose Setting Powder**](https://www.anastasiabeverlyhills.com/products/loose-setting-powder)for baking and a matte finish.

[![Image 320: Get the Look: Blended & Blurred Complexion](https://www.anastasiabeverlyhills.com/cdn/shop/articles/010225_MetaObject_Article-Frame_Perfectly-Blend-and-Blurred-Foundatio_a994edaa-39c8-411d-9e5e-3c7860a618f5.jpg?v=1746722837&width=600) face ### Get the Look: Blended & Blurred Complexion A blended and blurred look is where makeup has invisibly melted seamlessly into your skin, creating a smooth, even finish where imperfections, lines and texture have disappeared. It’s a wonderfully natural-looking “soft focus” appearance that is always appealing, always flattering. And it’s surprisingly easy to create, if you know how. The key is new Impeccable Blurring Second-Skin Matte Foundation from Anastasia Beverly Hills. Step1: Prime Start by prepping your skin with your favorite skincare or primer. (If you have dry skin, we recommend making our Hydrating Oil part of your routine.) Then apply 1-2 pumps of Impeccable Blurring Second-Skin Matte Foundation, starting in the center of your face and working outward. Blend with A30 Pro Brush in circular motions to a seamless finish. Focus on desired areas to build coverage, using pressing motions to massage the product into your skin. Step 2: Perfect Next, let’s brighten and conceal any visible imperfections with Magic Touch Concealer. Using the wand, apply directly under the eyes, over blemishes or discoloration – anywhere you want extra coverage. Start with a light layer and build as desired. Blend and diffuse using Brush 18 or tap with your fingertips using gentle pressure. To cover blemishes, select the shade closest to your natural skin tone. To neutralize redness, select a shade with a golden undertone. Step 3: Set Finally, set your new look with Impeccable 24HR Blurring Matte Setting Spray to blur and mattify for a long-wearing finish. Shake the bottle before use. Hold it 6-8 inches away from your face and mist 2-4 times over in an X-and-T pattern so you coat the skin evenly. (Be sure to keep it out of your eyes!) For an extra locked-in look, finish with Loose Setting Powder – this lightweight, silky formula is wonderfully blendable and sets makeup with a smooth, matte finish. DETAILS

Anastasia Beverly Hills **Sugar Glow Kit®**is a professional-quality powder highlighter glow kit featuring 4 pink-toned shades that deliver intense luminosity. Featuring a lightweight, refined formula, each shade in this must-have [**face makeup**](https://www.anastasiabeverlyhills.com/collections/face)collection delivers buildable coverage with a metallic-lustre finish. The 4 shades in this glow-boosting highlighter [**makeup kit**](https://www.anastasiabeverlyhills.com/collections/face) are ideal for all skin tones and can be used anywhere on the face, [**body**](https://www.anastasiabeverlyhills.com/collections/body-makeup), and [**eyes**](https://www.anastasiabeverlyhills.com/collections/eyes). 

**Shades included:**

*   Marshmallow _- White pearl_
*   Gumdrop _- Duo chrome pink lilac_
*   Starburst _- Icy pink_
*   Butterscotch _- Honey gold_

**Size:**0.26 Fl. Oz | 7.4 mL each

WHY YOU'LL LOVE IT

*   Shades can be used for highlighting the eyes, face and body
*   Each shade delivers impressive color payoff and applies easily
*   The removable magnetic-backed pans make it easy to customize your palette
*   Vegan and cruelty-free

HOW TO APPLY

*   Layer the shades in this pink-toned Anastasia Glow Kit® together or wear separately on the face, eyes, [**lips**](https://www.anastasiabeverlyhills.com/collections/lips)and body. Highlighters can be applied wet or dry for true versatility in makeup application.
*   For a natural-looking glow, tap a [**makeup brush**](https://www.anastasiabeverlyhills.com/collections/makeup-brushes)like[**A23 Pro Brush**](https://www.anastasiabeverlyhills.com/products/a23-large-tapered-blending-brush)on the powder and then sweep over the high points of the face. For an intense glow, gently push the fibers of**A23 Pro Brush**into the powder and use a stippling motion to apply to the high points of the face—including the tops of the cheeks, bridge and tip of the nose, Cupid's bow, chin, inner corners of the eyes and brow bone.
*   To sculpt, use the lightest shades in the glow kit (_**Marshmallow**_ and _**Starburst**_) on the highest points of the face.
*   For a sun-kissed touch of color, apply the pink-lilac shade (_**Gumdrop**_) to the apples of the cheeks.
*   The deepest shade (_**Butterscotch**_) adds warmth and shape to the perimeter of the face, nose and cheeks.

**Pro Tips:**

*   For maximum reflect and intense color, pair your**Sugar**shades with a[**setting spray**](https://www.anastasiabeverlyhills.com/products/dewy-set-setting-spray).
*   For a multidimensional highlight, layer multiple shades together on the high points of the face.
*   For an all-over body glow, mix any**Sugar**shade with[**Hydrating Oil**](https://www.anastasiabeverlyhills.com/products/hydrating-oil).
*   For a metallic lip effect, apply any**Sugar**shade on top of[**Liquid Lipstick**](https://www.anastasiabeverlyhills.com/products/liquid-lipstick)or[**Matte & Satin lipsticks**](https://www.anastasiabeverlyhills.com/products/matte-satin-lipstick).
*   Apply any**Sugar**shade over your[**Darkside Waterproof Gel Liner**](https://www.anastasiabeverlyhills.com/products/waterproof-gel-liner-darkside)or[**Jet Waterproof Crème Color**](https://www.anastasiabeverlyhills.com/products/waterproof-creme-color)application for a duo chrome finish.

INGREDIENTS

**MARSH MALLOW:** TALC, ETHYLHEXYL PALMITATE, OCTYLDODECANOL, SYNTHETIC FLUORPHLOGOPITE, SYNTHETIC WAX, BORON NITRIDE, CALCIUM ALUMINUM BOROSILICATE, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, DIMETHICONE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, MAGNESIUM MYRISTATE, SILICA, THEOBROMA GRANDIFLORUM SEED BUTTER, TIN OXIDE, MAY CONTAIN/PEUT CONTENIR (+/-): MICA, TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891)

**GUMDROP**: ETHYLHEXYL PALMITATE, OCTYLDODECANOL, TALC, SYNTHETIC FLUORPHLOGOPITE, BORON NITRIDE, SYNTHETIC WAX, CALCIUM ALUMINUM BOROSILICATE, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, DIMETHICONE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, MAGNESIUM MYRISTATE, THEOBROMA GRANDIFLORUM SEED BUTTER, TIN OXIDE, MAY CONTAIN/PEUT CONTENIR (+/-): RED 40 LAKE (CI 16035), IRON OXIDES (CI 77492, CI 77499), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891)

**BUTTERSCOTCH**: ETHYLHEXYL PALMITATE, OCTYLDODECANOL, SYNTHETIC FLUORPHLOGOPITE, TALC, SYNTHETIC WAX, BORON NITRIDE, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, DIMETHICONE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, MAGNESIUM MYRISTATE, THEOBROMA GRANDIFLORUM SEED BUTTER, TIN OXIDE, MAY CONTAIN/PEUT CONTENIR (+/-): MICA, IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891)STARBURST:TALC, ETHYLHEXYL PALMITATE, OCTYLDODECANOL, SYNTHETIC WAX, SYNTHETIC FLUORPHLOGOPITE, BORON NITRIDE, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, DIMETHICONE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, MAGNESIUM MYRISTATE, THEOBROMA GRANDIFLORUM SEED BUTTER, TIN OXIDE, MAY CONTAIN/PEUT CONTENIR (+/-): MICA, RED 7 LAKE (CI 15850), RED 40 LAKE (CI 16035), IRON OXIDE (CI 77492), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891)

description
-----------

 The go-to face and body foundation for House of Dior runway shows, Dior Backstage Face & Body Foundation offers luminous results and a custom-coverage effect, from the most natural glow to a high-perfection complexion. It immediately evens out and smooths the complexion, and blurs imperfections for a weightless, second-skin finish. 

Imperceptible and comfortable, the ultra-fine texture of this liquid foundation blends seamlessly with the skin upon application for long-lasting wear that withstands extreme conditions:* exercise, contact with water, high temperatures and damp environments. 

Composed of 94%** natural-origin ingredients, the formula of the foundation is infused with plant-derived squalane and hyaluronic acid. Non-comedogenic, Dior Backstage Face & Body Foundation hydrates the skin all day long.

* Test performed between 25-30°C with 30-40% humidity.

** Amount calculated based on the ISO 16128-1 and ISO 16128-2 standard. Water percentage included. The remaining ingredients contribute to the formula’s performance, sensory appeal and stability. 

 See more 

Benefits
--------

 Dior Backstage Face & Body Foundation offers a natural, luminous finish, blending seamlessly with the skin.

Its buildable coverage can be adjusted to suit all makeup desires, from the most natural to the boldest looks. Its "backstage-proof" formula composed by Peter Philips, Creative and Image Director for Dior Makeup, stands up to the fast-pace backstage runway shows and the most extreme conditions:* exercise, contact with water, and high temperatures.

The foundation ensures a long-wearing makeup result and day-long hydration thanks to the squalane and hyaluronic acid complex in the formula. Comfortable and weightless, its formula cannot be felt on the skin and doesn't create a dry sensation over time.

* Test performed between 25-30°C with 30-40% humidity. 

 See more 

Formula
-------

 Fresh and ultra-fine, the formula of this foundation is composed of 94%* natural-origin ingredients, infused with plant-derived squalane and hyaluronic acid. It hydrates the skin for a feeling of comfort that lasts all day long.

Dermatologically tested and non-comedogenic.

Dior is committed to sustainable beauty: this foundation respects the Dior responsible formulation charter by notably excluding the following ingredients from its formula: parabens, aluminum salts, diethyl phthalate, BHA and cyclic silicones. Below you may find the complete list of ingredients.**

This foundation's ingredients were selected in accordance with a strict list.

* Amount calculated based on the ISO 16128-1 and ISO 16128-2 standard. Water percentage included. The remaining ingredients contribute to the formula’s performance, sensory appeal and stability.

** See the “Responsible Formulation Charter” Dior page to learn more. This foundation fully complies with the Dior responsible formulation charter by excluding the following ingredients from its formula: BHA (Butylhydroxyanisole), Cyclohexasiloxane, Cyclopentasiloxane, Diethyl phthalate, Formaldehyde-releasing preservatives, Homosalate, Palm oil and palm oil derivatives not certified by RSPO (Roundtable on Sustainable Palm Oil), ingredients derived from genetically modified species (GMO – Genetically modified organisms), MIT / MCIT (Methylisothiazolinone / Methylchloroisothiazolinone), Octocrylene, Oxybenzone and other benzophenones, Parabens, Aluminum salts, Triclocarban, Triclosan, TEA (Triethanolamine) / ETA (Ethanolamine). 

 See more 

Shades
------

 A range of shades formulated with mineral pigments, composed by Peter Philips, Creative and Image Director for Dior Makeup, and divided into undertones to suit a wide range of skin tones. 

 See more 

Peter Philips’s Tips
--------------------

 "Regardless of your need, whether to correct or enhance your complexion, this range will provide the perfect solution." Peter Philips, Creative and Image Director for Dior Makeup 

 See more 

How to Apply
------------

 LIGHT COVERAGE:

Use your fingers to gently dab on a thin layer of foundation and then massage onto the face.

MEDIUM COVERAGE:

Apply two thin layers of foundation, each time blending from the center of the face outwards with the Dior Backstage brush N° 11.

HIGH-PERFECTION FULL COVERAGE:

Apply up to 3 thin layers of foundation using small circular movements. 

 See more

Cookies on Dior.com
-------------------

By continuing to navigate on our website, you agree to the storing of cookies on your device to enhance site navigation, analyze site usage, and assist in our marketing efforts. You can update or manage your preferences by clicking on ‘Cookie Settings.’ To learn more, see our [Privacy Policy](https://www.dior.com/en_us/beauty/folder?fid=personal-data#content-detail-privacy-statement-bahasa) . 

Cookies Settings

Do Not Sell or Share My Personal Information
--------------------------------------------

Dior uses cookies—small text files stored on your device when you visit an online service—including third-party cookies, and other trackers, for strictly necessary purposes that allow our website to function, for performance reasons that allow us to measure and improve the performance of our website, for functional reasons such as to provide you with enhanced functionality and personalization, for targeted advertisements such as to provide you with marketing aligned with your previous choices and behavior, and for social media purposes that allow you to share our content with your friends and networks.

 Under some data protection laws, our sharing of such information, including basic identification information, device information, internet activity, and commercial information to third parties through cookies and other trackers for the purposes above (other than strictly necessary cookies) may be considered a “sale” or “share” for targeted advertising.

 You have the right to accept or reject all cookies that may result in a “sale” or “share” for targeted advertising. Rejecting all cookies will opt you out of all “sales” and “sharing” for targeted advertising. If you visit us from a different device or browser, or clear cookies, then you may need to return to this screen to re-select your preferences. Even if you opt out, your use of our website or app may still be analyzed by Dior and/or our service providers.

 Please note that if you do not make a selection below, all cookies will be rejected.

 You can learn more about our processing of your personal information by visiting our Privacy Policy at [Cookie Policy](https://www.dior.com/en_us/fashion/personal-data#christian-dior-privacy-policy)

 Targeted Advertising Linked to Your Email Address: 

 We may use your email address to deliver targeted advertising of Dior products on third party platforms. To opt-out of the sharing of your personal information for this purpose, please contact 

 a. Christian Dior Couture at contactdiorus@christiandior.com or 1-800-929-3467, or 

 b. Parfums Christian Dior at customerservices@dior.com or call us at 1-877-794-3066.

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work.

Cookies Details‎

#### Performance Cookies

- [x] Performance Cookies 

We use cookies to enhance your online experience by personalizing content and recognizing you when you log in from different devices (e.g. mobile, tablet, computer). These cookies also enable us to transmit your e-mail address and/or phone number collected via our forms to Google and Meta in order to offer you tailored retargeting campaigns. In addition, they help us to measure and improve the performance of our site by counting visits and traffic sources, and by analyzing page popularity. If you do not allow these cookies, we will not be able to personalize your experience or optimize the performance of our site. See our Cookie Policy for more information.

Cookies Details‎

#### Functional Cookies

- [x] Functional Cookies 

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.

Cookies Details‎

#### Social Media Cookies

- [x] Social Media Cookies 

These cookies are set by a range of social media services that we have added to the site to enable you to share our content with your friends and networks. They are capable of tracking your browser across other sites and building up a profile of your interests. This may impact the content and messages you see on other websites you visit. If you do not allow these cookies you may not be able to use or see these sharing tools.

Cookies Details‎

#### Targeting Cookies

- [x] Targeting Cookies 

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.

Do Not Sell or Share My Personal Information
--------------------------------------------

Dior uses cookies—small text files stored on your device when you visit an online service—including third-party cookies, and other trackers, for strictly necessary purposes that allow our website to function, for performance reasons that allow us to measure and improve the performance of our website, for functional reasons such as to provide you with enhanced functionality and personalization, for targeted advertisements such as to provide you with marketing aligned with your previous choices and behavior, and for social media purposes that allow you to share our content with your friends and networks.

 Under some data protection laws, our sharing of such information, including basic identification information, device information, internet activity, and commercial information to third parties through cookies and other trackers for the purposes above (other than strictly necessary cookies) may be considered a “sale” or “share” for targeted advertising.

 You have the right to accept or reject all cookies that may result in a “sale” or “share” for targeted advertising. Rejecting all cookies will opt you out of all “sales” and “sharing” for targeted advertising. If you visit us from a different device or browser, or clear cookies, then you may need to return to this screen to re-select your preferences. Even if you opt out, your use of our website or app may still be analyzed by Dior and/or our service providers.

 Please note that if you do not make a selection below, all cookies will be rejected.

#### Your Privacy

We are a member of the L’Oreal USA S/D, Inc. family of brands (10 Hudson Yards New York, New York 10001). When You visit Our website, We (or third parties) collect information, including using cookies (or similar technologies such as pixels, web server logs, web beacons, server-side tracking, etc.) (collectively, **“Cookies”**). This information relates to You such as Your use and interaction with the site, products purchased or considered, your preferences, browsing information; identifiers, Your device, and inferences made from this information. We use Cookies to make the site work as You expect it to, to provide a more personalized web experience, and advertising. We do permit third parties to control the collection of information about You when You browse Our site using Cookies. 

 We do use features provided by our service providers/data processors to collect or associate directly identifying information you provide on Our site (such as name, phone number, or email address) with other information collected by Cookies. This feature allows us to personalize the services on the Site and messages We send to You (e.g., cart reminder emails or texts, requests to leave a review post-purchase). 

 Our Site also uses features provided by advertising companies (such as Google’s ‘enhanced conversions’ or Facebook’s ‘advanced matching’). Through these features directly identifying information You provide on Our site (such as a phone number or email address), is provided to them with other information collected by Cookies. This information is used by these third parties to better connect your account with these companies with Your activities on our Site to (i) enhance measurement Our advertisements (e.g., identify if an individual saw our advertisement and then visited our website) and (ii) identify groups of alike consumers to optimize Our own marketing campaigns. 

 You can choose not to allow certain categories of Cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings according to your preference. You are not able to change settings relating to Essential Cookies. Please note: when you make a choice You will need to refresh the page or navigate to a new page for Your selection to become effective. 

 Information We collect is subject to our Privacy Policy. 

[Privacy Policy](https://www.giorgioarmanibeauty-usa.com/customer-service/privacy-policy/privacy-policy.html)

#### Essential Cookies

Always Active

These Cookies are essential for the website to function, allow You to navigate Our Site, create an account or place orders; manage the security of the website (including to detect and prevent fraudulent activity), and/or to provide access to other features and functionality on the site, and cannot be switched off. They are usually set in response to actions requesting services, such as setting your privacy preferences, using ‘remember me’ functionality, adding items to or purchasing items from your cart, logging in, or filling in forms. 

 These Cookies also enable enhanced functionality provided by Us or third-party providers whose services We use. For example, features and services like web chat services, virtual try-on tools and services, commenting and rating systems; store locators, tools that ask for Your feedback or for research purposes (e.g., survey tools); tools that provide visitors with quizzes and product finders, and tools that allow Us to post user-generated content. These can include third-party payment solutions (e.g., PayPal, ApplePay), buy-now pay later services, or service that provide free shipping. Providers of these services may use their own analytics cookies (or similar technologies) to measure performance of these services. You may be able to use your browser's settings to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site may not work properly.

#### Functional Cookies

- [x] Functional Cookies Active

These technologies enable Us to provide enhanced functionality and personalization on this website. These generally run in the background of the Site. These include A/B tools that help Us run tests of different versions of the site and monitor visitor behavior; tools that monitor actions you take or do not take on the Site that We use to personalize Your experience on Our Site (e.g., product recommendations, predictive sort, product search, etc. personalized to you), and tools We use to personalize real-time customer journeys, including across email, SMS, and directly on Our site (e.g.., abandoned cart messages, browsing without buying a product messages, personalized offers, emails requesting You leave a review post-purchase, etc.). These technologies are often provided by third-party service providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you disable this category these technologies may continue to function but result in a less personalized visit.

#### Personalized Advertising

- [x] Personalized Advertising Active

Cookies in this section are used, in whole or in part, for cross-contextual behavioral advertising as described below. In some U.S. states this type of activity is considered (1) a ‘sale’, (2) or ‘share’ or ‘use’ of personal information for targeted advertising, or (3) both. 

 You may accept or disable use of Cookies for cross-contextual behavioral advertising by using this toggle. You may change your preference by clicking “Online Preferences” in the footer of the site and making a different selection. Accepting these Cookies is not a condition of accessing Our goods or services. Your choice is specific to the device, website, and browser You are using, and is deleted when you clear Your browser’s cookies. Otherwise, preferences are recorded in a cookie that expires in one year. Due to changes implemented by Apple in the Safari browser, settings may be saved only until you close the browser. Safari users should check cookie settings each time they use Safari to access our Site. Information about rights available to You is available in Our Privacy Notice or accessing Your Privacy Choices.

*   ##### Analytics Cookies

- [x] Switch Label label  
These Cookies, including from Google Analytics, allow us to count visits and traffic sources and understand what pages are the most and least popular so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They also help us track and replay a visitor’s journey on our site to understand how visitors move around and interact with the site. We use Google Analytics Advertising Features to share information with Google about your use of this site to allow us to deliver relevant and personalized advertising or content to you on other sites and/or other devices connected to You (cross-device advertising), to receive demographic and interest data from Google in our analytics reports, and to create audience segments based on demographic and interest data. Google's use of this information is subject to its own privacy policy, is no longer protected by Us, and Google may rediscose this information. If you do not agree to Our use of analytics cookies, We will disable them. We may continue to use Google Analytics to enable us to collect information about the use of our site (with Google Analytics Advertising Features disabled).

*   ##### Marketing Cookies

- [x] Switch Label label  
These Cookies are set through Our site by Our advertising technology providers, primarily to provide cross-contextual behavioral advertising. They collect information about Your browsing history to build a profile of Your interests and understand Your habits to show you relevant advertisements from Us or other advertisers on other sites or to other devices connected to you (cross-device advertising), to limit the number of times You see an advertisement, measure the effectiveness of advertising, and improve their products and optimize their own ad targeting systems. 

 We also use a data management platform ("DMP") that uses Cookies to collect information about visitors to Our Site. We can augment this information with offline data We collect and other data We obtain from third parties. We use this data to help Us create audience segments (e.g., users who left an item in a shopping cart, exclude users who made a purchase, etc.) stored within Our DMP, which We can later distribute audience segments comprised of identifiers (cookie ID, device ID, user ID, etc.) to third-party destinations to allow Us to target and re-engage with individuals across the web. We can also use these Cookies to measure the performance of Our advertisements. 

 If you do not allow these Cookies you will experience less targeted advertising.

*   ##### Social Media Cookies

- [x] Switch Label label  
These cookies are set by a range of social media services that we have added to the site to enable you to share our content with your friends and networks. They are capable of tracking your browser across other sites and building up a profile of your interests. This may impact the content and messages you see on other websites you visit. If you do not allow these cookies you may not be able to use or see these sharing tools.

#### Session Replay Cookies

- [x] Session Replay Cookies Inactive

These Cookies are provided by third parties, including our service provider Glassbox. They track and record a visitor’s journey and interactions on our site by capturing certain aspects of a visitor’s activities on our site such as page views, clicks, bounce rates, inputs, taps and mouse movements, scrolls and swipes, session time, and keystrokes/key touches. This technology allows us to recreate or replay a visitor’s journey to help us understand how visitors move around and interact with the site. We use this information to measure and improve the performance of our site, understand the user’s experience, detect and troubleshoot errors, and other purposes listed in our privacy notice.

#### Your Privacy

We are a member of the L’Oreal USA S/D, Inc. family of brands (10 Hudson Yards New York, New York 10001). When You visit Our website, We (or third parties) collect information, including using cookies (or similar technologies such as pixels, web server logs, web beacons, server-side tracking, etc.) (collectively, **“Cookies”**). This information relates to You such as Your use and interaction with the site, products purchased or considered, your preferences, browsing information; identifiers, Your device, and inferences made from this information. We use Cookies to make the site work as You expect it to, to provide a more personalized web experience, and advertising. We do permit third parties to control the collection of information about You when You browse Our site using Cookies. 

 We do use features provided by our service providers/data processors to collect or associate directly identifying information you provide on Our site (such as name, phone number, or email address) with other information collected by Cookies. This feature allows us to personalize the services on the Site and messages We send to You (e.g., cart reminder emails or texts, requests to leave a review post-purchase). 

 Our Site also uses features provided by advertising companies (such as Google’s ‘enhanced conversions’ or Facebook’s ‘advanced matching’). Through these features directly identifying information You provide on Our site (such as a phone number or email address), is provided to them with other information collected by Cookies. This information is used by these third parties to better connect your account with these companies with Your activities on our Site to (i) enhance measurement Our advertisements (e.g., identify if an individual saw our advertisement and then visited our website) and (ii) identify groups of alike consumers to optimize Our own marketing campaigns. 

 You can choose not to allow certain categories of Cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings according to your preference. You are not able to change settings relating to Essential Cookies. Please note: when you make a choice You will need to refresh the page or navigate to a new page for Your selection to become effective. 

 Information We collect is subject to our Privacy Policy. 

[Privacy Policy](https://www.giorgioarmanibeauty-usa.com/customer-service/privacy-policy/privacy-policy.html)

#### Essential Cookies

Always Active

These Cookies are essential for the website to function, allow You to navigate Our Site, create an account or place orders; manage the security of the website (including to detect and prevent fraudulent activity), and/or to provide access to other features and functionality on the site, and cannot be switched off. They are usually set in response to actions requesting services, such as setting your privacy preferences, using ‘remember me’ functionality, adding items to or purchasing items from your cart, logging in, or filling in forms. 

 These Cookies also enable enhanced functionality provided by Us or third-party providers whose services We use. For example, features and services like web chat services, virtual try-on tools and services, commenting and rating systems; store locators, tools that ask for Your feedback or for research purposes (e.g., survey tools); tools that provide visitors with quizzes and product finders, and tools that allow Us to post user-generated content. These can include third-party payment solutions (e.g., PayPal, ApplePay), buy-now pay later services, or service that provide free shipping. Providers of these services may use their own analytics cookies (or similar technologies) to measure performance of these services. You may be able to use your browser's settings to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site may not work properly.

#### Functional Cookies

- [x] Functional Cookies Active

These technologies enable Us to provide enhanced functionality and personalization on this website. These generally run in the background of the Site. These include A/B tools that help Us run tests of different versions of the site and monitor visitor behavior; tools that monitor actions you take or do not take on the Site that We use to personalize Your experience on Our Site (e.g., product recommendations, predictive sort, product search, etc. personalized to you), and tools We use to personalize real-time customer journeys, including across email, SMS, and directly on Our site (e.g.., abandoned cart messages, browsing without buying a product messages, personalized offers, emails requesting You leave a review post-purchase, etc.). These technologies are often provided by third-party service providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you disable this category these technologies may continue to function but result in a less personalized visit.

#### Personalized Advertising

- [x] Personalized Advertising Active

Cookies in this section are used, in whole or in part, for cross-contextual behavioral advertising as described below. In some U.S. states this type of activity is considered (1) a ‘sale’, (2) or ‘share’ or ‘use’ of personal information for targeted advertising, or (3) both. 

 You may accept or disable use of Cookies for cross-contextual behavioral advertising by using this toggle. You may change your preference by clicking “Online Preferences” in the footer of the site and making a different selection. Accepting these Cookies is not a condition of accessing Our goods or services. Your choice is specific to the device, website, and browser You are using, and is deleted when you clear Your browser’s cookies. Otherwise, preferences are recorded in a cookie that expires in one year. Due to changes implemented by Apple in the Safari browser, settings may be saved only until you close the browser. Safari users should check cookie settings each time they use Safari to access our Site. Information about rights available to You is available in Our Privacy Notice or accessing Your Privacy Choices.

*   ##### Analytics Cookies

- [x] Switch Label label  
These Cookies, including from Google Analytics, allow us to count visits and traffic sources and understand what pages are the most and least popular so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They also help us track and replay a visitor’s journey on our site to understand how visitors move around and interact with the site. We use Google Analytics Advertising Features to share information with Google about your use of this site to allow us to deliver relevant and personalized advertising or content to you on other sites and/or other devices connected to You (cross-device advertising), to receive demographic and interest data from Google in our analytics reports, and to create audience segments based on demographic and interest data. Google's use of this information is subject to its own privacy policy, is no longer protected by Us, and Google may rediscose this information. If you do not agree to Our use of analytics cookies, We will disable them. We may continue to use Google Analytics to enable us to collect information about the use of our site (with Google Analytics Advertising Features disabled).

*   ##### Marketing Cookies

- [x] Switch Label label  
These Cookies are set through Our site by Our advertising technology providers, primarily to provide cross-contextual behavioral advertising. They collect information about Your browsing history to build a profile of Your interests and understand Your habits to show you relevant advertisements from Us or other advertisers on other sites or to other devices connected to you (cross-device advertising), to limit the number of times You see an advertisement, measure the effectiveness of advertising, and improve their products and optimize their own ad targeting systems. 

 We also use a data management platform ("DMP") that uses Cookies to collect information about visitors to Our Site. We can augment this information with offline data We collect and other data We obtain from third parties. We use this data to help Us create audience segments (e.g., users who left an item in a shopping cart, exclude users who made a purchase, etc.) stored within Our DMP, which We can later distribute audience segments comprised of identifiers (cookie ID, device ID, user ID, etc.) to third-party destinations to allow Us to target and re-engage with individuals across the web. We can also use these Cookies to measure the performance of Our advertisements. 

 If you do not allow these Cookies you will experience less targeted advertising.

*   ##### Social Media Cookies

- [x] Switch Label label  
These cookies are set by a range of social media services that we have added to the site to enable you to share our content with your friends and networks. They are capable of tracking your browser across other sites and building up a profile of your interests. This may impact the content and messages you see on other websites you visit. If you do not allow these cookies you may not be able to use or see these sharing tools.

#### Session Replay Cookies

- [x] Session Replay Cookies Inactive

These Cookies are provided by third parties, including our service provider Glassbox. They track and record a visitor’s journey and interactions on our site by capturing certain aspects of a visitor’s activities on our site such as page views, clicks, bounce rates, inputs, taps and mouse movements, scrolls and swipes, session time, and keystrokes/key touches. This technology allows us to recreate or replay a visitor’s journey to help us understand how visitors move around and interact with the site. We use this information to measure and improve the performance of our site, understand the user’s experience, detect and troubleshoot errors, and other purposes listed in our privacy notice.
